
# Edge Cases and Special Tests

## Empty Paragraphs
Text before empty paragraphs.
Text after empty paragraphs.

## Links with Special Characters
[Link with spaces](https://example.com/path%20with%20spaces)
[Link with (parentheses)](https://example.com/path\(with\)parentheses)

## Text with Special Markdown Characters
This has \* asterisks \* and _ underscores _ and backtick characters
Backslashes \\ and pipes | need escaping
Tilde \~ characters too

## Numbered List Starting at 5

5. First item (should be 5)
6. Second item (should be 6)
7. Third item (should be 7)

## Japanese Style Numbering

1. First item (aiueo format)
2. Second item (aiueo format)

## Table with Empty Cells

|  |  |  |
|--|--|--|
|A1|  |C1|
|  |B2|  |


## Multiple Formatting in One Run
~~***Bold, italic and strikethrough all at once***~~

## Complex Table

|                |               |
|----------------|---------------|
|**Bold Header** |*Italic Header*|
|Cell with \| pipe|Normal cell    |
